summary: A car mechanic in a small, working class town comes out of the closet to his unsuspecting, blue-collar best friends.
cast: Parker Young|Evan Todd|Chord Overstreet|Jon Gabrus|Kate Flannery|Jennifer Damiano|Jordan Lane Price|Doug Moe|Alex Rennie|Brooke Dillman|Jake Epstein|Sean Hankinson|Drake Abshire|Tyler Barnes|Heather Blair|Tommy Bracco|Nick Clark|Kenneth De Abrew|Cristina DiCarlo|Brett Eidman|Danelle Eliav|Emily Gardner|Trey Gerrald|Mitch Giannunzio|Brandon Gill|Laura Harrier|Lucas Hazlett|Elisabeth Henry|Richard Lounello|Nnete Matima|Kenneth McBain|Steven Patrick O'Connor|Merritt Reid|Erika Smith|Kyrsten St. Pierre|Vanessa Thorpe|James Weisel|Christopher Whalen|Marquis Wood
title: Fourth Man Out
